forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy...showers and thundershowers during the morning, then variable clouds this afternoon with more showers possible. High 14C. Winds SW at 40 to 55 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Winds could occasionally gust over 80 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy...showers and thundershowers during the morning, then variable clouds this afternoon with more showers possible. High 56F. Winds SW at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Winds could occasionally gust over 50 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and wind early...then remaining cloudy with showers overnight. Low 8C. Winds SW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with a steady rain this evening. Showers continuing overnight. Low 46F. Winds SW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Steady light rain in the morning. Windy with showers continuing in the afternoon. High around 10C. Winds WSW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the morning. Windy with showers continuing in the afternoon. High 51F. Winds WSW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low 8C. Winds W at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low near 45F. Winds W at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early, then remaining overcast and windy later in the day. High around 10C. Winds WNW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning then continued cloudy and windy in the afternoon. High near 50F. Winds WNW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly cloudy. Low 6C. Winds NW at 25 to 40 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. Low 43F. Winds NW at 15 to 25 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High around 10C. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 51F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 6C. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear. Low 42F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny skies. High 12C. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny. High 53F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear. Low 6C. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear. Low 42F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Plentiful sunshine. High 11C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mainly sunny sky. High 52F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear to partly cloudy. Low 6C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 44F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Wind increasing. A few clouds from time to time. High near 10C. Winds WNW at 30 to 50 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Wind increasing. A few clouds from time to time. High around 50F. Winds WNW at 20 to 30 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds early will give way to generally clear conditions overnight. Low near 5C. Winds NW at 25 to 40 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low around 40F. Winds NW at 15 to 25 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High near 10C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High near 50F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear. Low near 5C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 41F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Generally sunny. High around 10C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Plentiful sunshine. High around 50F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 7C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening with more clouds for later at night. Low 44F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High around 10C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High near 50F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers after midnight. Low 6C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to occasional showers later during the night. Low 42F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.
